data.trans_hint: Những con rùa trở lại bờ biển để sinh sản.
data.en_hint: The turtles return to the coast to reproduce.
data.content_game_1: The turtles return to the coast to reproduce.
data.answer_en_hint: The turtles return to the coast to reproduce.

data.trans: Dày đặc, đông đúc, rậm rạp
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi bước vào một khu rừng rậm rạp.
data.content_game_1: We entered a dense forest.
data.answer_en_hint: We entered a dense forest.

data.trans_hint: Đây chỉ là bản nháp đầu tiên của bài tiểu luận của tôi.
data.en_hint: This is only the first draft of my essay.
data.content_game_1: This is only the first draft of my essay.
data.answer_en_hint: This is only the first draft of my essay.

data.trans: Sự chảy, lượng chảy, lưu lượng, luồng nước
data.trans_hint: Có một lượng lớn tuyết tan chảy xuống núi.
data.en_hint: There was a large flow of melting snow down the mountain.
data.content_game_1: There was a large flow of melting snow down the mountain.
data.answer_en_hint: There was a large flow of melting snow down the mountain.

data.content_game_1: It's freezing out there!
data.answer_en_hint: It's freezing out there!

data.trans: Bền, khỏe, dùng được trong công nghiệp/ làm việc nặng
data.trans_hint: Họ quyết định rằng không xe tải công nghiệp nào được đi qua trung tâm thành phố trong giờ cao điểm.
data.en_hint: They decided that no heavy-duty trucks are permitted to pass through the centre of the city during rush hours.
data.content_game_1: They decided that no heavy-duty trucks are permitted to pass through the centre of the city during rush hours.
data.answer_en_hint: They decided that no heavy-duty trucks are permitted to pass through the centre of the city during rush hours.

data.trans_hint: Một hồ chứa nước cung cấp nước cho thị trấn này.
data.en_hint: The town is supplied with water from a reservoir.
data.content_game_1: The town is supplied with water from a reservoir.
data.answer_en_hint: The town is supplied with water from a reservoir.

data.trans: Nghiêm trọng, nghiêm khắc, nặng nề, mãnh liệt
data.trans_hint: Anh ta bị chấn thương nghiêm trọng ở đầu.
data.en_hint: He suffered a severe head injury.
data.content_game_1: He suffered a severe head injury.
data.answer_en_hint: He suffered a severe head injury.

data.trans_hint: Cô đi dạo dọc bờ biển, suy nghĩ trầm tư.
data.en_hint: She paced along the shore, deep in thought.
data.content_game_1: She paced along the shore, deep in thought.
data.answer_en_hint: She paced along the shore, deep in thought.

data.trans: Gieo rắc, gây mầm, đưa ra (cảm xúc, ý kiến...)
data.trans_hint: Tôi gieo rắc vào tâm trí Andy sự nghi ngờ về kết quả học tập.
data.en_hint: I sow doubt in Andy's mind about academic results.
data.content_game_1: I sow doubt in Andy's mind about academic results.
data.answer_en_hint: I sow doubt in Andy's mind about academic results.

data.trans_hint: Hôm qua trời mưa xối xả.
data.en_hint: It was a torrential rain yesterday.
data.content_game_1: It was a torrential rain yesterday.
data.answer_en_hint: It was a torrential rain yesterday.

data.trans: Sự run, sự rùng mình, cơn rùng mình (vì sợ hãi, lo lắng hoặc lạnh)
data.trans_hint: Có một chút run rẩy trong giọng nói của anh ta.
data.en_hint: There was a slight tremor in his voice.
data.content_game_1: There was a slight tremor in his voice.
data.answer_en_hint: There was a slight tremor in his voice.
